website_summaries.verdict: Rescue Bots Transformers like Heatwave are great for younger kids ages 3-7.
pros: Comes with translucent water cannon that attaches to hand in bot mode and front of fire truck in car mode
Durable enough to take handling by young kids

customer_reviews.title: Looks like they are fooling customers...
customer_reviews.text: We order rescue bots, toy came without original cover....it came like loose toy, very disappointing!!
customer_reviews.author: Prashanth

customer_reviews.title: Not what i ordered!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed we got this for my son for Xmas and he was really bummed out because it looked nothing like the picture. It wasn't even the same toy! Disnt have the accessories and didn't look anything like the show heatwave and nothing like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: kelly brandt

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: This is not the same one you find at a store- it came terribly- no packaging - just put into a random box. Literally looks like it came from a “happy meal”. It’s TINY- my son won’t find this interesting! Waste of $$ I should have went to Target.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: "Frustration-Free" Package is false!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in hopes to gift it to boy who loves his toys. The packaging is terrible. This does not come in the original packaging. Granted it stated "frustration free" packaging, however it was very difficult to open and get the toy from the unattractive cardboard box. If I was struggling (adult), imagine a little boy trying to open this himself for his birthday. Just not very nicely packaged. The toy itself may be great, but the packaging itself threw me off. Just beware in case you plan on gifting this!
customer_reviews.author: ria

customer_reviews.title: My son (3 YO) loves this toy
customer_reviews.text: This is the largest of the rescue bots toys we've gotten for my son, Heatwave is his favorite (he calls him B-wing) so he really likes this toy. It comes with some extra accessories which were quickly lost - but the toy itself is holding up well. It seems to be slightly sturdier than the other rescue bots we've gotten, and those aren't exactly flimsy so I see this lasting a long time. It is also slightly more difficult to transform than the other smaller ones, but he is still able to manage to do so without assistance. If your child enjoys the rescue bots they will enjoy this toy.
customer_reviews.author: JCS

customer_reviews.title: Great for 3 year old. Robust and transforms easily.
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old is entranced. This is our first true transformer. We had some smaller toys that "transformed" but he was constantly pulling parts off or crying for us to help bc he didn't have the fine motor skills for their tiny pieces. That is why we welcomed Heatwave into our home. Not for my child, but for our own sanity. Kiddo loves it. Only day one in but the toy seems to be fairly robust and transforms easily. He has already saved some duplo buildings and several members of the paw patrol. I will likely purchase more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Amazon exclusive ones are so much better!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Amazon exclusive Rescue Bots and my only regret is that I only got my son 3 of them when there are more characters available. He has several that we purchased from other big box retailers and these are SO MUCH BETTER! These are a little bigger, easier to transform and you can just tell the quality is so much better. The plastic material is shiny, they stay together better when they transform, they have an accessory and the colors seem brighter. We will be getting the other characters for his birthday in March. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: M. HieberTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy, outer packaging needs work
customer_reviews.text: Overall this toy is great and does exactly what it's supposed to do. My son loves it! The only downside is the package it came in was a plain brown box with no description of the toy. I gave it to my son for Christmas but when he opened the wrapping paper, he had no idea what it was. We had to open the box and put it together before he realized it. For a kid that small, it's important to get the excitement going right away, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: lturner2010

customer_reviews.title: Not nicely packaged
customer_reviews.text: This toy is small and comes in a plain box without the cute packaging and therefore, does not make a good gift. I intended to give this as a Christmas gift for my grandson but it is so small and unattractive I'm just going to give it to him as an every day gift. After I looked at it, since you have to take the box apart, it already appears used. I suppose some people would like it as it is easier to remove from the packaging but I wanted it to look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Shari Klase

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: The package in my opinion was frustration free. I really dislike the packaging you get from Walmart with all the zip ties & what not strapping it down. This was in a brown box with one plastic bag over it. The actual toy itself is cute. It transforms really easy. The color is vibrant even if my pic quality is low. My son was very excited to get heatwave in the mail today!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great transformer toy for young kids, easy transformation, and hours of fun.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my three and four year olds for Christmas and they LOVE it. It is super simple to transform between a vehicle and a robot, and they have had many hours of fun playing with it and their other rescue bots. They like the rescue bots cartoon and I think that helped them enjoy these toys as they often quote lines form the show or sing the theme song as they play. The light blue piece that attaches is kind of a pain, it doesn't stay on very well and for my kids they just don't play with that part.
customer_reviews.author: Amber D. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: I made my 3 yr old buddy VERY HAPPY on his bday!!
customer_reviews.text: I was asked to get Bots for my little buddies bday. His older brother have some & his mom told me that Playskool has them for smaller kids - easier for them to handle and transform. They are perfect - I both 5 different ones - yes VERY HAPPY LITTLE GUY!!! He loves them all - quality product - as far as I know they are standing the test of constant use and still holding up fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for younger kids!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 1/2 year old son loves the Rescue Bots. He got turned on to the Playskool BumbleBee from the 1st Transformers movie, but now can’t get enough of the Rescue Bots. These toys are great for his tiny hands, easy to change and the Netflix show is great! Also, these toys can take a beating. LOL!
customer_reviews.author: E.P.

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: My 4-year-old son loves Rescue Bots. He was very excited to receive Heatwave for Christmas! This is a great toy and seems well made. You can transform Heatwave by flipping his ladder back and forth. Easy to transform for both of my kids (4 and 2 years old). Overall happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: amymn

customer_reviews.title: 3 boys love these RescueBots
customer_reviews.text: 3 boys love these RescueBots. Super high quality and they take a beating. We've had these for 6 months and nothing has broken. Really love that the details are not stickers so they can get in the snow or pool and stay on. Very happy boys and mom
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: Toddler-proof
customer_reviews.text: Unbreakable for a 3 yr old. I like that it's a larger size, and transforms easily in one motion back and forth.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old LOVES this. He is obsessed with vehicles and robots so this satisfies both. Super easy for him to transform on his own. It did break once after a heavy drop so had to use a butter knife to push one of the mechanisms back in place but worked fine after that.
customer_reviews.author: Chap

customer_reviews.title: Great first transformer
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 3.5 yeat old son as his first transformer. He loves it. He taught ME how to tranform it right out of the box. He played with it all evening, allowing me time to finish mulching the gardens. He even wanted to sleep with it. Now it's morning and we are watching the show, tranformer in hand. I'd say it was a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few of these Playskool Transformers for my two year old since my big kid is obsessed. This one might be his favorite. Super easy to transform and its fun as the truck and the robot. So many of these only look good one way or another, and I think this one's good as both. I'm glad they came up with a transformer that doesn't take 15 moves to change!
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great starter Transformer for 4 year old
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my nephew for Christmas and out of all of the things that he received (there were a lot) this was by far his favorite gift!!! It's fantastic for beginning stem toys as they assist in helping children realize that things can transform and how it does it. I will be purchasing more of these in the future...ps they can handle the rough handling of a 4 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Quark

customer_reviews.title: Perfet for a recue bot loving kid
customer_reviews.text: This came and was more impressed that I thought I would be. It is a perfect, durable toy for my 4 year old boy that is rough on everything-I would suggest this product to anyone and we will be buying more from this same company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy! Easy to use and good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Nonstop play for the last couple hours!! My 3 year old has NO PROBLEM transforming the toy between robot and truck. Which is a BIG win for me, who was worried it might be complicated and he couldn’t do it smoothly without help. Will definitely order more!!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Not as well made as 4 years ago
customer_reviews.text: Got this to round out my preschoolers rescue bot collection. He had several older ones from my 10 year old. While this one is still super easy to operate it doesn't feel as solid and well made as the ones from a few years back. It is solidly OK but I was disappointed in the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mommyof3littles

customer_reviews.title: Great for younger kids to transform
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 3.5 year old for Christmas and he loves it so much. Great for younger kids who can’t do the more complication transformations that some toys have. It’s stood up so far to all the play.
customer_reviews.author: Jaimie

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Described, Plain Box but Perfect Product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described, came with the attachment (which attaches in several places, bonus!) A little bigger than the first season bots but works out since he's the leader. Easy to transform and seems to be holding up being played with every day by a 3 yr. old. If you like fancy packaging look for a different product (came wrapped in plastic in a plain box with only the Hasbro logo on it and with instructions on white paper) but for completing my son's set it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Candy Sosa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 3-5 year olds
customer_reviews.text: A good looking and sturdy toy. Very intuitive transformation with easy motions. It has about 3 steps to transform unlike some of the other rescue bots, which just have one, so it's more entertaining without being complicated. If the 4 of this series I've seen, it's definitely the best.
customer_reviews.author: Jared G

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Great toy for kids. Easy to transform (until it gets dirt and grime caked on it). Not the most durable toy, most because of the moving parts. This is our second one of the same model. Still a great toy though.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Bad packaging, very small!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered for Christmas the packaging is horrible it looks like a Happy Meal Toy in a plastic bag so I can’t wrap it up. It is much smaller than I expected, my son will still enjoy it but I’m using as a stocking stuffer and would definitely not spend 15$ on this item again!
customer_reviews.author: KATIE BOWERS

customer_reviews.title: Head won’t stay down
customer_reviews.text: From day one, like other reviews said, his head would not stay down when transformed to vehicle form. My kid lost his interest and was disappointed. I tried to get creative to fix it but nothing worked.
customer_reviews.author: KimmerP511

customer_reviews.title: My son love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is a very good material, very strong and a very good design. It is appropriate for a 3 years old kid because it is very easy to transform.
customer_reviews.author: José Francisco Mariño Fonseca

customer_reviews.title: Great starter transformer for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this toy. He got right before age 3. It's sturdy and easy for a young kid to transform. The only thing I'm not a fan of is the blue water gun. I think we threw it away. It comes off easily. But you don't really need it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a hardy toy!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves this and he hasn’t broken it yet! My son is pretty rough on toys so I was worried that he’d figure out how to disassemble this transformer. Two weeks of daily play and it’s functioning well.
customer_reviews.author: Keri and Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy !
customer_reviews.text: Love this one ! We have all of them and it’s hit or miss with the quality. This one is the easiest one to transform, extremely durable and one of my sons favorite toys
customer_reviews.author: Todd Hirsch

customer_reviews.title: Not what is pictures.
customer_reviews.text: Robot was yellow and did not have the water canon. The only feature that resembles heatwave is the red fire hat. Is same as ambulance only yellow with very little red trim. Not correct. Is not what is pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect transformer toy for younger kids!
customer_reviews.text: This one is perfect for younger kids that like transformers. It’s very easy to change back and forth between fire truck and robot and not easy to break. We will definitely be buying more of these!
customer_reviews.author: A H

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good built
customer_reviews.text: Actually pretty good built. For the price, I thought it might not be well build, but I aas wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price or the product!
customer_reviews.text: It is worth $8.00 and not $14.95 It is small and comes in a plastic bag ... not nice packaging for a gift. I would buy it for a 2 year old and no child older than that. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: AltaCockr

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Kids have been using it aggressively for weeks and still in great shape. Good value
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old son just loved these for Christmas!! So much better then the ones I can get from Walmart!
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for a coworkers son but it had a cracked leg within an hour of opening.
customer_reviews.author: laura brooks

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old great-grandson asked for Rescue Bots toys for Christmas. He especially likes firefighters and policemen. I think he's going to like this toy. He won't see it until Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Son loves this
customer_reviews.text: My almost 3yo adores this toy. He carried it around everywhere with him for about 2 weeks straight. Now he's just very possessive over it and hardly lets anyone else play with it.
customer_reviews.author: The Real Slim Shady

customer_reviews.title: Good transformer
customer_reviews.text: My son fell in love worh this toy at his Dad’s barber shop but then it went missing. He was super upset. Santa must have noticed, he brought him a new one of his own this Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Jessica W

customer_reviews.title: kid loved it
customer_reviews.text: heatwave seems to have a beard in this model. But still an great buy for the price
customer_reviews.author: Fixen84

customer_reviews.title: Fun and durable
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old son loves this. It is easy to transform and perfect for little hands. It also (knock on wood) has been durable against the drops so far. If your little likes Rescuebots or toys that transform, this is a winner!
customer_reviews.author: PEP

customer_reviews.title: Helps keep our non verbal son's hands busy!!
customer_reviews.text: Helps keep our non verbal son's hands busy!! We have multiple of this toy just in case it gets lost!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to transform
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 3 year old for Christmas. It works like it should. It's easy to transform.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy
customer_reviews.text: The child we purchased this for loved it!!! He had no problem with the transformer and didn't need any help to do it by himself at 4 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Transforms with ease
customer_reviews.text: My son received it for Christmas. He loves rescue bots. Now we have to make room in his bed for heatwave.
customer_reviews.author: Maryann Lumley

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Too easy for my 3 year old. And the accessory? No directions where it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Kellsingz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bot
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for Christmas and it’s still my child’s favorite Rescue Bot toy (we’ve got A LOT of them). Also - some rescue bot toys lose their ability to close because the plastic wears away. This guy still clicks into fire truck mode even with a two year old opening and closing, just like a two year old does.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel M C

customer_reviews.title: Toy for son
customer_reviews.text: Another phase my son discovered on TV. He seems to have a pretty good time with these toys.
customer_reviews.author: InkmanSD

customer_reviews.title: Great for a 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old got this for Christmas and he absolutely loves it. He figured out how to transform it by himself within minutes. He's pretty hard on toys and it's holding up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to tranform
customer_reviews.text: My son really likes this and can transform this himself and he’s 4 years old. Durable and looks really nice and is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: My toddler loves it
customer_reviews.text: Great quality.. I’ve bought other transformers and they have been extremely difficult to transform. This one is easy for my toddler to transform. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: My little boy loves it. He has played with it nonstop since he got it. It transforms just by moving the position of the ladder. Very kid friend and no small parts to worry about.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal McCullough

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this!
customer_reviews.text: My son plays with this everyday. Doesn't do too much but he loves it
customer_reviews.author: JMS

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy for the age group
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the packaging, but recipient did not seem to care. Very happy with the toy. Great for preschoolers.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: This toy a big hit
customer_reviews.text: Gifted to 4yr old grandson. 3 months later still loving it. Durable and easy to use parts
customer_reviews.author: Karen Z

customer_reviews.title: My five-year-old daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My five-year-old daughter LOVES playing Transformers and recently found the Rescue Bots on Netflix. She loves Heatwave and was so excited about this for Christmas. It's perfect for her little hands, and she can transform it on her own.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Kent Molden

customer_reviews.title: Received wrong item
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my sons birthday and when we opened it, it was not the “energize” heatwave that is pictured. We received the yellow truck looking one. Too late for returns now.
customer_reviews.author: King

customer_reviews.title: Fun good quality toy!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this toy! Good quality and accessory was included with the toy (we received an energized Chase police bot without his accessory previously). My son loves this one!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Got a different rescue bot.
customer_reviews.text: I got a rescue bot that my kid likes. But I got a two headed dragon heatwave. Not the one pictured here.
customer_reviews.author: Maxim

customer_reviews.title: Mother approves
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his rescue bots for Christmas! Ordered Chase, Optimus, and Blades as well. Well made great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Well built!
customer_reviews.text: Well built, easy to operate. Bought it for my 3yr old, he loves them all. Easy for him to transform and play!! Would recommend to any one with a young child that likes robots!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Boring
customer_reviews.text: My 4 and 5 year old boys were bore with it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small for the money
customer_reviews.text: This was small for the money but my three year old loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Zelinski

customer_reviews.title: Great for younger kids
customer_reviews.text: Best for little kids. Not to hard to transform. My 4 yr old loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Abraham

customer_reviews.title: Great gift! High quality & Worth what we paid.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this toy. We bought it as a Christmas gift after watching him entertain himself for over an hour with one that belonged to his cousin. He is 3! He takes it everywhere. It is a great size for smaller hands and for taking on the go. It is very easy to transform!
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Clark

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than anticipated
customer_reviews.text: Son loves transformers so this was perfect for him! Smaller than I thought it would be, but he plays with it very often!!

customer_reviews.title: Really cool. You won't know this is a bot when it is on car mode!
customer_reviews.text: This particular one does an amazing disguise. Has become one of kiddo's favorite!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My three year old grandson loves this and the 6yrs old likes to play with it also.

customer_reviews.title: Transformer - Fire truck
customer_reviews.text: The kids LOVED it. Great quality and simple for the kids to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: Cormac A. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a high quality product that will withstand quite a bit of play.

customer_reviews.title: Easy for my 4 year old grandson to transform.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my grandson! He loved it! It is good quality

customer_reviews.title: small
customer_reviews.text: they are alot smaller than I thought. I was looking for bigger ones

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. Easy to transform but my kid is 3 so I wasn't looking for anything too complicated. He loves it.

customer_reviews.title: Great toy! Easy to transform!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived a day before the due date. My son loves it. It so easy to transform. There is just a worry about the part where the head is connected though, it is just a single white piece if plastic inside. But i think it will last like the other Playskool easy tranforming transformer we bought.

customer_reviews.text: Lots of opportunity to use your imagination when playing with this well made toy. It's been dropped and even thrown by younger brother but it survived nicely.

customer_reviews.text: This is such a creative toy. Feels better than the marketed versions! Easy to manipulate and creative design.

customer_reviews.text: My son Loves it (that's an understatement) Great quality and does what he likes... TRANSFORMS.

customer_reviews.title: these are great toys. We plan on purchasing all of them ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the only Transformer from this specific line that we've has an issue with. The head piece doesn't fit securely when it is in vehicle mode and sometimes pops open. Otherwise, these are great toys. We plan on purchasing all of them from this set anyway.

product_meta.title: Playskool Heroes Transformers Rescue Bots Energize Heatwave the Fire-Bot Converting Toy Robot Action Figure, Toys for Kids Ages 3 and Up (Amazon Exclusive)
product_meta.description:
Product Packaging:Frustration-Free PackagingThis classic Transformers Rescue Bots Heatwave the Fire-Bot toy is sized right for small hands and designed with Easy 2 Do conversion. It takes just 1 easy step for little heroes to convert the heroic Heatwave the Fire-Bot action figure from robot mode to fire truck mode and back! The Heatwave the Fire-Bot toy robot comes with an Energize water cannon accessory that attaches to the fire truck’s cab in vehicle mode. In robot mode, the figure holds the water cannon! A great gift for kids ages 3 and up, both boys and girls will love pretending to roll to the rescue with the Playskool Heroes converting Heatwave the Fire-Bot toy!

Manufactured under license from TOMY Company, Ltd.
Transformers Rescue Bots is a trademark and copyright of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: 2-IN-1 RESCUE BOTS TOY: Little heroes can enjoy twice the fun with 2 modes of play, converting this Heatwave the Fire-Bot action figure from a fire truck to a robot and back again
AS SEEN IN THE TRANSFORMERS RESCUE BOTS TV SERIES: Kids can imagine rolling to the rescue with this Heatwave the Fire-Bot action figure, inspired by the Transformers Rescue Bots animated TV show

EASY TO DO: Designed with Easy 2 Do conversion preschoolers can do, this Heatwave the Fire-Bot figure is a great gift. With 1 easy step, kids can convert this Rescue Bots toy from a robot to a vehicle

ENERGIZE THE EXCITEMENT: The Energize gear water cannon accessory attaches to the Heatwave the Fire-Bot toy in both vehicle and robot mode. Kids will love pretending to blast obstacles to save the day
IMAGINATIVE PLAY: The fun and oversized Transformers converting robot toy inspires adventurous imaginative play for boys and girls ages 3 and up
